mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ssafytrip.reviews ( user_id, no, rating, title, content, review_like, motive_code, com_num, created_at, modified_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{spotId}, #{rating}, #{title}, #{content}, #{reviewLike}, #{motiveCode}, #{comNum}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE ssafytrip.reviews SET rating = #{rating}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, motive_code = #{motiveCode}, com_num = #{comNum}, modified_at = NOW() WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, r.no, s.title as spot_title, r.rating, r.review_like, r.title, r.content, r.motive_code, r.com_num, r.created_at, r.modified_at, u.id as user_id, u.nickname, u.name, u.email, u.profile_image, u.role, u.bio, u.gender, u.age, u.created_at as user_created_at, u.updated_at as user_updated_at FROM ssafytrip.reviews r JOIN ssafytrip.users u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN ssafytrip.spots s ON r.no = s.no WHERE r.review_id = #{reviewId}

SELECT r.review_id, r.no, s.title as spot_title, r.rating, r.review_like, r.title, r.content, r.motive_code, r.com_num, r.created_at, r.modified_at, u.id as user_id, u.nickname, u.name, u.email, u.profile_image, u.role, u.bio, u.gender, u.age, u.created_at as user_created_at, u.updated_at as user_updated_at FROM ssafytrip.reviews r JOIN ssafytrip.users u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN ssafytrip.spots s ON r.no = s.no WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
